bug.author: sykesdev
bug.description:
the following lines... <denchmark-code> min_length = int(feature.str.len().min()) max_length = int(feature.str.len().max()) </denchmark-code>
seem to fall foul of Pandas 1.x stricter rules. The following seems to work... <denchmark-code> min_length = int(feature.astype(str).str.len().min()) max_length = int(feature.astype(str).str.len().max()) </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: This is a fix in the next release.
